title: Gentleman Gnar, anyone else excited?

body:
Is it just me, or am I crazy for being way to excited for this skin? I mean, he throws a fricken pocket watch! 

{{champion:150}} is love
{{champion:150}} is life :D

replies.body: Voted no because I am rebel{{champion:48}}
He throws compliments, not boulders - right?
so excited, waiting for this since before it was announced,
